chapters.title: Chapter 27: To Surprise Queens and Kings
chapters.info: Queen Ethenielle Kirukan Materasu, p. 521 (606)—Holder of the Throne of the Clouds of Kandor—that is, the Queen of Kandor. She is plump, and has gray-streaked black hair. She is about half a hand taller than Merilille. She has blue eyes.
